name: Plant Transfer DFM
query:
SELECT
`tabDelivery Note`.name as "Delivery Note:Link/Delivery Note:150",
`tabDelivery Note`.posting_date as "Date:Date:100",
`tabDelivery Note`.company as "Company:Link/Company:180",
`tabDelivery Note`.customer as "Customer:Link/Customer:180",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.item_code as "Item Code:Link/Item:220",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.item_name as "Item Name:Data:100",
`tabItem`.item_sub_group as "Item Sub Group",
`tabItem`.category as "Item Category",
`tabItem`.item_group as "Item Group",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.qty as "Item Qty:Float:80",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.uom as "UOM :Data:80",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.rate as "Rate :Currency:80",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.amount as "Amount :Currency:100",
`tabDelivery Note Item`.batch_no as "Batch No :Data:100",
`tabDelivery Note`.mode_of_transport as "Mode Of Transport :Data:100"

FROM
`tabDelivery Note`, `tabDelivery Note Item` , `tabItem` 

WHERE
`tabDelivery Note Item`.parent = `tabDelivery Note`.name
and `tabDelivery Note`.customer not like "Scrap-Out" and
`tabItem`.item_code= `tabDelivery Note Item`.item_code and
`tabDelivery Note`.company=%(company)s and
`tabDelivery Note`.posting_date >=%(from_date)s and `tabDelivery Note`.posting_date <=%(to_date)s
order by `tabDelivery Note`.posting_date desc ;
